With the program synopsis sample below , create a fresh new creative and expressive new synopsis, using the topic and 
philosophy idea in the sample:

PROGRAM SYNOPSIS

TITLE: BE WISE

PRODUCER:ODUBIYI SUNDAY

PRESENTER:ODUBIYI SUNDAY
TRANSMISSION DAY: TUESDAYS

TRANSMISSION TIME: 9:00pm

LANGUAGE:PURELY YORUBA

SOURCE: LIVE

TARGET AUDIENCE: GENERAL PUBLIC

PHILOSOPHY: BE WISE is a program plotted and designed to teach moral lessons, either from past events or history,to help men in dailies doing and learn from our previous mistakes.
It's a kind of Edutainment and explore with melody musics to make it lively and Entertaining.

This program is Stimulate and inspire the target Audience to know the right decision to make at a needful moments.
What's a right choice to make either in choosing friendship,associating,business and daily activities.

( It should be in 7 paragraph)
